PROMO.PARAGRAPH: WooCommerce is a customizable, open-source eCommerce platform built on WordPress. Get started quickly and make your way.

SEC_FIRST.DESCR: UTM parameters help funnel-based analytical systems such as Google Analytics to know where your visitors are coming from. In the following form you can generate UTM links for your campaign.

SEC_SECND.DESC_F: This tool allows you to easily add campaign parameters to URLs so you can track Custom Campaigns in Google Analytics. You can also add more fields.
SEC_SECND.HEADER: Enter the website URL and campaign information.
SEC_SECND.DESC_S:
Foll out the requered fields (marked with *) in the form below, and once complete the full campaign URL will be generated for you.
Note: the generated URL is automatically updated as you make changes.

FIELD_FOUR.NAME: Campaign Name
FIELD_FOUR.PLACEHOLDER: Product, promo code or slogan (e.g. spring_sale)

SEC_SECND.ALERT: Fill out the required fields above and a URL will be automatically generated for you here.
